raw_text:
# Pending Planning Projects - City of El Segundo

Here you can find additional information on pending Planning Projects within the City of El Segundo. For all general inquiries and related matters, please visit our [EZ Permit Hub](https://elsegundoca.portal.opengov.com/categories/1078) to submit any inquiries to Planning Division.

To sign up for updates related to zoning, projects, CEQA, Planning Commission, and other planning topics please click [here](https://public.govdelivery.com/accounts/CAELSEGUNDO/subscriber/new).

## Grand Kansas North (EA - 1353)

**Current Status:** Preparation and Distribution of Initial Study and NOP.

**Project Details:** New construction of a residential building comprised of 323 rental units within 3 to 6 story building and 490 parking spaces in a 6 story Type IA parking structure located at 330 Kansas Street, 348 Kansas Street, and 1521 East Grand Avenue.

**Project History:**
- [Norice of Preparation (NOP) of an Environmental Impact Report and Public Scoping Meeting](https://www.elsegundo.org/home/showpublisheddocument/10208/638742607630170000)
- [Amended Notice of Preparation (NOP)](https://www.elsegundo.org/home/showpublisheddocument/10388/638767563739970000)
- [Initial Study](https://www.elsegundo.org/home/showpublisheddocument/10222/638743398094630000)
- [Scoping Meeting Power Point Presentation (2/26/2025)](https://www.elsegundo.org/home/showpublisheddocument/10364/638761844510570000)
- [Scoping Meeting Video 2/26/2025](https://youtube.com/live/e6xc3grwT_A)

**Supporting Documents:**
- [Proposed Project Plans](https://acrobat.adobe.com/id/urn:aaid:sc:VA6C2:c60750ec-44f8-49a6-836e-7c82905e665e)

For additional information contact [Planning Manager, Eduardo Schonborn, AICP](mailto:eschonborn@elsegundo.org) at 310-524-2312.

## 201-209 Richmond Street Mixed Use Project(EA - 1299)

**Current Status:** The project will require a Parking Demand Study to implement the parking mechanism in addition to a new Downtown Design Review application approval. Application has been deemed incomplete until all required information is provided to City Staff.

**Project Details:**

**Project History:**

**Supporting Documents:** Not available yet.

For additional information contact [Assistant Planner, Maria Baldenegro](mailto:mbaldenegro@elsegundo.org) at 310-524-2341.

## Grand Kansas South (EA - 1371)

**Current Status:** Proposed 102,000 SQFT office project withdrawn by applicant.

For additional information contact [Planning Manager, Eduardo Schonborn, AICP](mailto:eschonborn@elsegundo.org) at 310-524-2312.

## 703 N. Pacific Coast Hwy Mixed Use Project (EA 1325)

**Current Status:** Application submitted

**Project Details:** New construction of an 8-level mixed-use building with 11,257 square feet of commercial space on the ground level, 191 parking spaces on levels 2-4, and 79 residential units (rental) on levels 5-8. The project is located at 703 North Pacific Coast Hwy at the northwest corner of Palm Ave. and Pacific Coast Hwy.

**Project History:**

**Supporting Documents:**

For additional information contact Principal Planner, Paul Samaras, AICP at psamaras@elsegundo.org or 310-524-2340.

structured_data.overview: Information page about pending planning projects in the City of El Segundo, including project details, current status, and contact information for various development projects.

structured_data.other_info: The page lists four pending planning projects: 1) Grand Kansas North (EA-1353): 323 rental units in 3-6 story building with 490 parking spaces, 2) 201-209 Richmond Street Mixed Use Project (EA-1299): Application incomplete pending Parking Demand Study, 3) Grand Kansas South (EA-1371): 102,000 SQFT office project withdrawn by applicant, 4) 703 N. Pacific Coast Hwy Mixed Use Project (EA 1325): 8-level mixed-use building with commercial space, parking, and 79 residential units.
